--- Christin Agustini <qunyux@...> wrote:

> It is rather difficult to find much information
> about Japan history before Heike. Where can I find
> it? Is there any samurai before it?

Find "History of Japan to 1334" by George Sansom. It's
volume 1 of a 3 volume history of Japan, by one of the
best. 

Also, try "Hired Swords: The Rise of Private Warrior
Power in Japan" by Karl Friday if you want to know
about how the samurai class came about. 

For more, check the www.samurai-archives.com
recommended books section.
